  • Middleware Packages

Middleware Packages¶

Overview¶

embARC OSP leverages several open-source projects to deliver integrated IoT protocol stack choices for embedded devices based on DesignWare® ARC® processors. This section describes various middleware packages that have been ported and integrated for use in embARC OSP.

  • IoT Stacks and Platforms
    • AWS IoT device SDK
    • CoAP
    • HTTP Parser
    • LwM2M
    • mbed TLS
    • MQTT
  • Network Stacks
    • lwIP
    • OpenThread
  • Misc. Middleware Packages
    • Common
    • FatFS
    • fymodem
    • iHex
    • NT-Shell
    • Parson
    • u8glib
